On 11/21/05, Sandeep Shetty <sandeep.shetty@...> wrote:
> On 11/20/05=
, Roy T. Fielding <fielding@...> wrote:
> > If you try to author a neg=
otiated, query,
> > or computed resource, then I give the client an appropr=
iate error or
> > redirect to the source resource.
>
> One of the problems =
I've come across while trying to build RESTful
> applications is the proble=
m of DELETING multiple resources at once.

DELETE can only delete a single =
resource, but that doesn't mean
you can't build a resource that is a collec=
tion of other resources
and delete that. For example in this article [1] on=
 Amazons Queue Service
look at the Queue Subset resource. It represents
a s=
ubset of the Queue Entries and DELETING it
deletes the individual entries.
=

[1]  http://www.xml.com/pub/a/2005/01/05/restful.html

   -joe
